attributes.action: add three non-executive members to the Cabinet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1. Non-executive input at the Cabinet table would make its decisions more effective since, in theory, unbiased opinion would be expressed.
2. This could be tested by starting with three members: one each representing the average citizen, policy expertise and management expertise. Decisions need to benefit the average citizen; policies need to be relevant and initiatives need to be designed for best implementation.
3. These could be public appointments, with one-year tenures, vetted by OCPA.
